catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 501
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book; some text; images of a street scene with travelers walking past a complex of buildings with musicians and performers inside; another image of a staged performance; a temporary structure with people watching caged peacocks, and an armless figure shooting a bow; other images of figures sword fighting, theatre rehearsal; and text; gray cover with brown and green image of pinecones and pine needles in lower half; pink title label; yellow label on fton cover
markings: Marks on title label, in pencil: [204 / I-B]; Seal inside cover page URC: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 2
